"The seed is the word of God." "As the earth bringeth forth her bud, and as the garden causeth the things 
                                                                           105
that are sown in it to spring forth; so the Lord God will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth." Luke 8:11; Isaiah 61:11. As in the natural, so in the spiritual sowing; the power that alone can produce life is from God.
